com.github.rolecraftdev.data

Class PlayerData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rolecraftdev.data.PlayerData

  • public final class PlayerData
extends Object
    Holds Rolecraft data for a specific player, which is stored in SQL.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerData(UUID playerId, String name)
      Constructs a new PlayerData object for a player

        public boolean isLoaded()
        Returns whether this data has finished loading
        Returns:
        True if this data is loaded, otherwise false

        Returns whether this data is currently being unloaded
        Returns:
        Whether this data is currently being unloaded

      • getGuild

        public UUID getGuild()
        Gets the unique ID of the player's guild, or null if he doesn't have one. Null will also be returned if the data isn't loaded
        Returns:
        The unique ID of the player's guild - null if he doesn't have one or if the data isn't loaded

      • getProfession

        public UUID getProfession()
        Gets the unique ID of the player's profession, or null if he doesn't have one. Null will also be returned if the data isn't loaded
        Returns:
        The unique ID of the player's profession - null if he doesn't have one or if the data isn't loaded
